name: Edge of Fortune
description:
A simple pixel art turn based RPG.

Rok, a treasure hunter, has been on a long journey in search of the Macca, a secret rumored area where the bounty is plentiful.  Along his way he meets Hesh, a well traveled adventurer who happens to accompany him on his quest.  Join the cast of characters in search of the treasure and see what story unfolds.

Demo available now!

Controls: Mouse

Text: https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram || https://vrtxrry.itch.io/dungeonfont
Music: https://muhammadriza.itch.io/free-fantasy-rpg-music-pack
